sentence.Network_en: I recorded premium payments , prepared bank deposits and sorted payables.
sentence.Network_cn: 我要记录保险赔偿金, 准备银行押金,将收到的付款分类等.

sentence.Network_en: We hope your side can check timely and complete the payables!
sentence.Network_cn: 希望贵方及时核对,并将所有应付款项予以支付!

sentence.Network_en: The problem was to match receivables and payables in the same currency.
sentence.Network_cn: 问题在于使用同一种货币使应收款与应付款保持平衡.
